resources.string: Whether you’re a daily commuter or just out for a laag kay wa’y lingaw sa balay, BIYAHE helps you move with the city’s rhythm—through its lifeline: the jeepneys. Know where to ride, when to say "lugar lang," and how to get there hassle-free. From the busy kanto to the tucked-away eskina, we’ve got the routes, stops, and even the pila covered.
No more guessing. No more "Asa ni dapit?" or "Saag na sad ta, bai." Just clear, simple, local travel—powered by BIYAHE.

1. INTRODUCTION

Welcome to Biyahe ("we," "our," or "us"). Biyahe is a mobile application designed to show users the different jeepney routes in Cebu, Philippines. By downloading, accessing, or using our application, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms").

2. ACCEPTANCE OF TERMS

By accessing or using the Biyahe application, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our application.

3. USER ACCOUNTS AND REGISTRATION

3.1 Account Creation
To use certain features of Biyahe, you must register for an account. When registering, you agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information about yourself.

3.2 Account Security
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

4. DATA COLLECTION AND PRIVACY

User Information:
We collect limited personal information to provide and improve our services, including but not limited to:
- Username
- Account information

Limited Use of Data:
We will only use your personal information for the following purposes:
- Providing jeepney route information in Cebu
- Customer support
- Improving app functionality
- Safety and security features
- Legal compliance

No Third-Party Sharing:
We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes or any purposes unrelated to the operation of the Biyahe app.

Data Security:
We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.

5. USE OF THE SERVICE

5.1 License
We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to use the Biyahe app for personal, non-commercial purposes.

5.2 Prohibited Activities
You agree not to:
- Use the app for any illegal purpose
- Attempt to gain unauthorized access to Biyahe systems
- Interfere with other users’ access to the app
- Reverse engineer or attempt to extract the source code of the app
- Use the app in a way that could damage or overburden our servers
- Create multiple accounts or false identities

6. APP USAGE

6.1 Free Service
Biyahe is currently provided as a free service for viewing jeepney routes in Cebu. There are no fees associated with basic use of the application.

6.2 Future Services
Any potential future premium services will be clearly marked within the app, and separate terms may apply to such services.

7. USER CONTENT

7.1 Reviews and Feedback
You may have the opportunity to provide reviews, comments, or other content. You retain ownership of this content, but grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, display, and distribute such content for the purposes of operating and improving the app.

8. THIRD-PARTY SERVICES

The app may integrate with third-party services such as maps or payment processors. Your use of these services may be subject to additional terms from those third parties.

9. DISCLAIMERS

9.1 "AS IS" Basis
The Biyahe app is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis without warranties of any kind.

9.2 Service Availability
We do not guarantee that the app will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free.

10. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY

To the maximum extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or relating to your use of the app.

11. INDEMNIFICATION

You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Biyahe and its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, liabilities, costs, or expenses arising from your use of the app or violation of these Terms.

12. TERMINATION

12.1 Termination by You
You may terminate your account at any time by following the instructions in the app.

12.2 Termination by Us
We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the app at our sole discretion, without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties.

13. CHANGES TO TERMS

We may modify these Terms at any time. If we make material changes, we will provide notice through the app or by other means. Your continued use of the app after such notice constitutes your acceptance of the modified Terms.

14. DISPUTE RESOLUTION

Any dispute arising from these Terms or your use of the app shall be governed by the laws of the Philippines, without regard to conflict of law principles.

15. GENERAL PROVISIONS

15.1 Entire Agreement
These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and Biyahe regarding the app.

15.2 Severability
If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable, that provision will be enforced to the maximum extent possible, and the other provisions will remain in full force and effect.

15.3 No Waiver
Our failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not be considered a waiver of those rights.

15.4 Contact Information
For questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
Email: aaronjacalan.business@gmail.com

By using the Biyahe app, you acknowledge that you have read these Terms and agree to be bound by them.
